mean_cn: adj. 保守的，反动的；  n. 反动分子
mean_en: a person who is strongly opposed to new political or social ideas
sentence: Reactionaries are extremely resistant to progressive political changes.
sentence_trans: 反动派在政治上表现得极端保守。
word_etyma: re回、向后 ＋ act行动，做 ＋ ion表示行为、行为的过程或结果、状态 ＋ ary有…性质的 → reactionary反动的，倒退的
